title: Whitman Mission National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Summer Hours:                                                                   Memorial Day Weekend through Labor Day WeekendSite and Trails: Open Daily  8:00 am – 4:30 pmVisitor Center: Open Daily  9:00 am – 4:00 pm     Open Memorial Day, July 4th and Labor Day ____________Winter Hours:Site and Trails:  Open Daily  8:00 am – 4:30 pmVisitor Center:  Open Wednesday through Sunday  9:00 am–4:00 pmVisitor Center: Closed December and JanuarySite, Trails, and Visitor Center: Closed on Federal Holidays
